pages.name: Crumbling
pages.text: The potion of Crumbling erodes the more mundane materials from under the feet of the afflicted. A higher potency version could theoretically destroy slightly harder materials.

A potion such as this one may be used offensively, to disrupt a foe's escape, or as a tool, to reach lower depths without getting tired. $(br2)A useful trick is to gather a handful of small creatures in an enclosure, say chickens, and applying this brew over them, to quickly have a large area of land dug downwards.
